participant_1.background:
I started dating again and went to the movies on Sundays with my new love.
i love soccer.
i also like ice cream.
I play the piano because it allows me to express myself creatively and connect with others.
I have a stuffed animal in my son's nursery.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy dressing up as a spooky creature for Halloween.
I made many memories with my family last year.
everyone says my pecan pie is the best they have ever had.
I have worked at my current job for two years and I am looking forward to moving to a new home in a quiet area where I can focus on my art.
i am a humble baker.

content.text: Hey there, what do you like to do?
I enjoy many things, what about you?
I love to play the piano, do you have any musical talents?
I enjoy baking and singing, I am also a pretty good seamstress, but I am not very good at playing the piano.
I love to bake too, and I am pretty good at singing. I do not know how to sew very well.
What kind of music do you like to bake?
I love to bake all sorts of things, but I am particularly fond of chocolate chip cookies and banana bread.
I love chocolate chip cookies too, and I also enjoy making pecan pie.
Pecan pie is one of my favorite desserts, I am glad that you like to make it.
It is a family favorite, and I am always happy to share it with others.
I am sure it is delicious, I would love to try it some time.
I would be happy to make some for you, I am always looking for an excuse to bake.
That is very kind of you, I would love to try your pecan pie.
I will be sure to make some for you soon
